column5: Just looking to see if anybody stayed at the Wine Lake Outpost on Wabaskang Lake. How was it and was it worth the $1000? I've heard good things about Wabaskang but is this outpost close to good fishing or do I have to travel? Scott

Scott, Wine lake is very nice and remote. you won't regret staying there. I never have but have talked to many who did. As for the fishing, get in your boat....drive two minutes...and you'll have all the eyes, trout, northerns you can handle. jk
